abstract: The company will mark its 40th anniversary by presenting four operas on four different Boston stages as it continues to search for a permanent home.

headline.print_headline: Boston Lyric Opera Is on the Move
headline.main: Boston Lyric Opera Announces Itinerant 2016-17 Season

snippet: The company will mark its 40th anniversary by presenting four operas on four different Boston stages as it continues to search for a permanent home.
